items.title: Home Advantage Boost
items.signal: Teams playing at home have won 70% of their last 10 matches.
items.whyItMatters: Home teams often perform better due to familiar conditions and fan support.

items.title: Injury Impact
items.signal: Key players missing from the squad have led to a 40% drop in win probability.
items.whyItMatters: Injuries to star players can significantly weaken a team's competitive edge.

items.title: High Scoring Games Trend
items.signal: The last 5 matches between these teams have averaged over 3 goals.
items.whyItMatters: Historical scoring trends indicate potential for high-scoring matches.

items.title: Tactical Shift
items.signal: Recent formation changes have resulted in a 60% increase in offensive plays.
items.whyItMatters: Tactical adjustments can lead to improved team performance and scoring opportunities.

items.title: Momentum Shift
items.signal: Teams on a 3-match winning streak tend to outperform opponents in the next fixture.
items.whyItMatters: Winning momentum can boost team confidence and performance levels.

items.title: Defensive Weakness
items.signal: Teams conceding more than 2 goals per match have a 75% chance of losing.
items.whyItMatters: A leaky defense is a strong indicator of potential losses in upcoming games.

items.title: Head-to-Head Dominance
items.signal: One team has won 8 out of the last 10 encounters against their opponent.
items.whyItMatters: Historical dominance can influence current match outcomes and player mentality.

items.title: Late Game Performance
items.signal: Teams scoring in the last 10 minutes have a 50% higher chance of winning.
items.whyItMatters: Late-game scoring can shift the momentum and secure important points.

items.title: Weather Conditions
items.signal: Rainy conditions have historically favored teams with strong defensive setups.
items.whyItMatters: Weather can impact playing styles and advantages of certain teams.

items.title: Youth Player Breakthrough
items.signal: Emerging youth talents have scored 30% of the team's goals this season.
items.whyItMatters: Incorporating youth players can rejuvenate a team's scoring potential and energy.

items.title: Penalty Conversion Rate
items.signal: Teams with a penalty conversion rate above 80% have won 9 out of 10 matches.
items.whyItMatters: High penalty success rates can be crucial in tight matches.

items.title: Managerial Influence
items.signal: Teams under new management have shown a 50% improvement in match results.
items.whyItMatters: A change in leadership can inspire better performances and strategies.

items.title: Set Piece Efficiency
items.signal: Teams scoring from set pieces have increased their goal tally by 40% this season.
items.whyItMatters: Effective set piece strategies can provide teams with an edge in tightly contested matches.

items.title: Red Card Impact
items.signal: Teams receiving a red card have lost 80% of their matches this season.
items.whyItMatters: Playing with a man down severely limits a team's chances of success.

items.title: Fan Influence
items.signal: Home teams with high fan attendance have a 65% win rate.
items.whyItMatters: Strong fan support can motivate players and lead to better home performances.

items.title: Counter Attack Success
items.signal: Teams utilizing counter-attacks have scored 50% of their goals in recent matches.
items.whyItMatters: Effective counter-attacking can exploit defensive weaknesses of opponents.

items.title: Midfield Control
items.signal: Teams dominating possession in midfield have won 75% of their recent games.
items.whyItMatters: Controlling midfield is crucial for dictating the pace and flow of the game.

items.title: Streaky Performers
items.signal: Teams alternating wins and losses tend to follow the pattern consistently.
items.whyItMatters: Identifying patterns in performance can help predict future outcomes.

items.title: Goalkeeper Form
items.signal: Goalkeepers with a save rate above 85% significantly boost their team's chances of winning.
items.whyItMatters: A strong goalkeeper can be the difference in close matches.

items.title: Late Transfers Impact
items.signal: New signings made in the last transfer window have contributed to 25% of total goals.
items.whyItMatters: Late transfers can provide a much-needed boost to a team's attacking options.
